org.clafer.ast

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.clafer.ast.Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Card
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Low and high cardinality. Immutable.
    Author:
    jimmy
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Card()
      Construct an unbounded cardinality.
      Card(int low)
      Construct a cardinality bounded from below, unbounded above.
      Card(int low, int high)
      Construct a cardinality bounded from below and above.

    • Method Detail

      • isExact

        public boolean isExact()
        Detects if this cardinality is so restrictive that only one possible value is allowed.
        Returns:
        true if and only if low and high cardinality is the same, false otherwise

      • isBounded

        public boolean isBounded()
        Detects if this cardinality is either bounded below and/or above.
        Returns:
        true if and only if this cardinality is not unbounded, false otherwise

      • hasLow

        public boolean hasLow()
        Detects if this cardinality is bounded below.
        Returns:
